content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel so moody since the outbreak of pandemic. Don't know where is the future of humanity.
I understand. It' s really been a bad year for everyone during the pandemic. I can tell you' ve been feeling really depressed too.
Yes, so how to deal with that?

I understand how that feels. I have experienced a lot of depression myself too. When I was in college, I had to completely isolate myself from others and everyone around me. I tried to connect with friends and family in order to stay connected.
